name: 50% is un oeuf
description: Rules and Controls: A and D to rotate camera. I to remove instructions. Click the chickens to increase their eggability. If their eggability reaches 50% they produce an egg. A chicken's eggability decreases over time. A chicken will die if it's eggability becomes 0%. Once it has egged, a chicken will only become eggable again when it's eggability goes back down below 40%. Click on one of the four feedboxes to increase overall eggability potential (max 100). Breed as many chickens as possible. Credits: Game design and programming: Mike Bailey Visual assets from Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/industrial/low-poly-farm-p... https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/meshtint-free-chicke... Music from freesound.org (creative commons license): https://freesound.org/people/Mrthenoronha/sounds/528717/ Sounds from freesound.org (creative commons license): https://freesound.org/people/ludist/sounds/204450/ https://freesound.org/people/tim.kahn/sounds/109875/ https://freesound.org/people/original_sound/sounds/366102/ https://freesound.org/people/Rudmer_Rotteveel/sounds/316920/
